channel.title: Crocodile on my Blog site
channel.description: Recent content in Crocodile on my Blog site

item.title: Crocodile
item.description: What Nmap scanning switch employs the use of default scripts during a scan? Ans: -sC What service version is found to be running on port 21? Ans: vsftpd 3.0.3 What FTP code is returned to us for the “Anonymous FTP login allowed” message? Ans: 230 After connecting to the FTP server using the ftp client, what username do we provide when prompted to log in anonymously? Ans: anonymous After connecting to the FTP server anonymously, what command can we use to download the files we find on the FTP server?
